activ.tot.en: KOF Daily Compound Indicator on Activity of the Swiss Population

mobil: KOF Daily Compound Indicator on the Physical Mobility of the Swiss Population

sales.en: KOF Daily Compound Indicator on the Sales and Buying Activity of the Swiss Population

details.en: PCA based indices/index based on various high-frequency series assembled by the Statistical Office of Zurich, Gesellschaftsmonitoring COVID-19, and by the KOF High Frequency Economic Monitoring Dashboard. See Eckert and Mikosch (Mobility and Sales Activity During the Corona Crisis: Daily Indicators for Switzerland, 2020) for details.
